com.apdplat.platform.action

类 SimpleAction<T extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apdplat.platform.common.DataPrivilegeControl

        • com.apdplat.platform.action.SimpleAction<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Action

extends ActionSupport
implements Action
